bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.drawer

Class DrawingLaneBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.drawer.DrawingLaneBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawingLane, SViewerSelectionListener, EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AxisDrawingLane, BasicFeatureDrawingLane, RulerDrawingLane, SequenceDrawingLane

    public abstract class DrawingLaneBase
extends Object
implements DrawingLane
    This is a default implementation of the DrawingLane interface.
